verses.verse: The priests<WH3548> the Levites,<WH3881> and all<WH3605> the tribe<WH7626> of Levi,<WH3878> shall have<WH1961> no<WH3808> part<WH2506> nor inheritance<WH5159> with<WH5973> Israel:<WH3478> they shall eat<WH398> the offerings of the LORD made by fire,<WH801> <WH3068> and his inheritance.<WH5159>
Therefore shall they have<WH1961> no<WH3808> inheritance<WH5159> among<WH7130> their brethren:<WH251> the LORD<WH3068> is their inheritance,<WH5159> as<WH834> he hath said<WH1696> unto them.

And this<WH2088> shall be<WH1961> the priest's<WH3548> due<WH4941> from<WH4480> <WH854> the people,<WH5971> from<WH4480> <WH854> them that offer<WH2076> a sacrifice,<WH2077> whether<WH518> it be ox<WH7794> or<WH518> sheep;<WH7716> and they shall give<WH5414> unto the priest<WH3548> the shoulder,<WH2220> and the two cheeks,<WH3895> and the maw.<WH6896>
The firstfruit<WH7225> also of thy corn,<WH1715> of thy wine,<WH8492> and of thine oil,<WH3323> and the first<WH7225> of the fleece<WH1488> of thy sheep,<WH6629> shalt thou give<WH5414> him.

For <WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath chosen<WH977> him out of all<WH4480> <WH3605> thy tribes,<WH7626> to stand<WH5975> to minister<WH8334> in the name<WH8034> of the LORD,<WH3068> him<WH1931> and his sons<WH1121> forever.<WH3605> <WH3117>

And if<WH3588> a Levite<WH3881> come<WH935> from any<WH4480> <WH259> of thy gates<WH8179> out of all<WH4480> <WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> where<WH834> <WH8033> he<WH1931> sojourned,<WH1481> and come<WH935> with all<WH3605> the desire<WH185> of his mind<WH5315> unto<WH413> the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> shall choose;<WH977>

Then he shall minister<WH8334> in the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068> his God,<WH430> as all<WH3605> his brethren<WH251> the Levites<WH3881> do, which stand<WH5975> there<WH8033> before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>
They shall have like portions<WH2506> <WH2506> to eat,<WH398> beside<WH905> that which cometh of the sale<WH4480> <WH4465> of<WH5921> his patrimony.<WH1>

When <WH3588> thou<WH859> art come<WH935> into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee, thou shalt not<WH3808> learn<WH3925> to do<WH6213> after the abominations<WH8441> of those<WH1992> nations.<WH1471>

There shall not<WH3808> be found<WH4672> among you any one that maketh his son<WH1121> or his daughter<WH1323> to pass through<WH5674> the fire,<WH784> or that useth<WH7080> divination,<WH7081> or an observer of times,<WH6049> or an enchanter,<WH5172> or a witch,<WH3784>
Or a charmer,<WH2266> <WH2267> or a consulter<WH7592> with familiar spirits,<WH178> or a wizard,<WH3049> or a necromancer.<WH1875> <WH413> <WH4191>

For <WH3588> all<WH3605> that do<WH6213> these things<WH428> are an abomination<WH8441> unto the LORD:<WH3068> and because<WH1558> of these<WH428> abominations<WH8441> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> doth drive them out<WH3423> <WH853> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> thee.
Thou shalt be<WH1961> perfect<WH8549> with<WH5973> the LORD<WH3068> thy God.<WH430>

For <WH3588> these<WH428> nations,<WH1471> which<WH834> thou<WH859> shalt possess,<WH3423> <WH853> hearkened<WH8085> unto<WH413> observers of times,<WH6049> and unto<WH413> diviners:<WH7080> but as for thee,<WH859> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath not<WH3808> suffered<WH5414> thee so<WH3651> to do.

The LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will raise up<WH6965> unto thee a Prophet<WH5030> from the midst<WH4480> <WH7130> of thee, of thy brethren,<WH4480> <WH251> like unto me;<WH3644> unto<WH413> him ye shall hearken;<WH8085>

According to all<WH3605> that<WH834> thou desiredst<WH7592> of<WH4480> <WH5973> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in Horeb<WH2722> in the day<WH3117> of the assembly,<WH6951> saying,<WH559> Let me not<WH3808> hear<WH8085> again<WH3254> <WH853> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> my God,<WH430> neither<WH3808> let me see<WH7200> this<WH2063> great<WH1419> fire<WH784> any more,<WH5750> that I die<WH4191> not.<WH3808>
And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, They have well<WH3190> spoken that which<WH834> they have spoken.<WH1696>

I will raise them up<WH6965> a Prophet<WH5030> from among<WH4480> <WH7130> their brethren,<WH251> like unto thee,<WH3644> and will put<WH5414> my words<WH1697> in his mouth;<WH6310> and he shall speak<WH1696> unto<WH413> them<WH853> all<WH3605> that<WH834> I shall command<WH6680> him.

And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that whosoever<WH376> <WH834> will not<WH3808> hearken<WH8085> unto<WH413> my words<WH1697> which<WH834> he shall speak<WH1696> in my name,<WH8034> I<WH595> will require<WH1875> it of<WH4480> <WH5973> him.

But <WH389> the prophet,<WH5030> which<WH834> shall presume<WH2102> to speak<WH1696> a word<WH1697> in my name,<WH8034> <WH853> which<WH834> I have not<WH3808> commanded<WH6680> him to speak,<WH1696> or that<WH834> shall speak<WH1696> in the name<WH8034> of other<WH312> gods,<WH430> even that<WH1931> prophet<WH5030> shall die.<WH4191>
And if<WH3588> thou say<WH559> in thine heart,<WH3824> How<WH349> shall we know<WH3045> <WH853> the word<WH1697> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> hath not<WH3808> spoken?<WH1696>

When <WH834> a prophet<WH5030> speaketh<WH1696> in the name<WH8034> of the LORD,<WH3068> if the thing<WH1697> follow<WH1961> not,<WH3808> nor<WH3808> come to pass,<WH935> that<WH1931> is the thing<WH1697> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> hath not<WH3808> spoken,<WH1696> but the prophet<WH5030> hath spoken<WH1696> it presumptuously:<WH2087> thou shalt not<WH3808> be afraid<WH1481> of<WH4480> him.
